segments.text: Ugh, look at this mess, water everywhere and no one even cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is, completely oblivious to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, it's a shame the inside is such a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children don't get hurt with all this water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a complete mess, someone needs to do something.
segments.speaker: PAR
